description: This ConceptMap represents a mapping from the HL7 V2 Segment OBX to the FHIR Observation Resource.
name: SegmentOBXtoObservation
copyright: Copyright (c) 2020, HL7 International, Inc., All Rights Reserved.

product.value: Any markup in ST, FT or TX data may not present properly given that valueString is a string data type
IF OBX-2 EQUALS "SN" and OBX-5.3 EQUALS "-"
IF OBX-2 EQUALS "SN" and OBX-5.3 EQUALS "+"
IF OBX-2 EQUALS "SN" and OBX-5.3 NOT IN (":", "/", "-", "+")
IF OBX-2 EQUALS "SN" and OBX-5.3 NOT IN (":", "/", "-", "+")
IF OBX-2 EQUALS "SN" AND OBX-5.3 EQUALS "-"
IF OBX-2 EQUALS "SN" AND OBX-5.3 EQUALS "-"
